CustomField.description: TASK0259500 - Requested by Sunny Jeyakumar. Reason: We need a new Yes/No field called “Subscription Plan” in Salesforce - Account Object for External Record type only (Retail brands) to know whether a patient signed up any subscription plans or not. This will field will be updated via Data Loader with the list of subscription plan signed up customers provided by Martin.
CustomField.label: Subscription Start Date
